name: Homecount
tagline: A virtual bookkeeper for home finances.
body:
It is an application to keep your home finances information in at hand.

## Project progress
* 2015-04-14 Initiate. The application should let you input your financial information and store that information permanently. For this the DBMS will be used. The information scheme and the source code is open.
Application programming language is Java (not limited to) but parts of it can be written in other languages.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
